channel.title: How To Keep Items When You Die?
channel.description: on my server i hate how you always lose items when you die, and i was wondering how to keep your 3 best items or all your items, can someone please help me with this?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 31, 2006, 08:38:16 PM[/size][hr]answer someone!
